name: hca_search_projects
description: Searches for single-cell projects in the Human Cell Atlas (HCA) Data Coordination Platform (DCP). This tool allows filtering projects based on specific organs and disease states.

action.description: The specific action to perform. Must be set to 'search_projects'.

organ.description: The organ to filter projects by. Examples include 'heart', 'liver', 'brain', 'kidney'. This field is optional.

disease.description: The disease state to filter by. Examples include 'normal', 'cancer', 'covid-19'. This field is optional.

limit.description: The maximum number of projects to return. The default is 10. Use this to control the size of the result set.

return_schema.description: A dictionary containing the search results, including the total count of hits and a list of project details.

total_hits.description: The total number of projects matching the search criteria.

projects.description: A list of project objects containing metadata about each matching project.

entryId.description: The unique identifier (UUID) for the project. This ID is used to retrieve file manifests.

organ.description: A list of organs associated with the project.

disease.description: A list of diseases associated with the project.

name: hca_get_file_manifest
description: Retrieves a list of downloadable files for a specific Human Cell Atlas (HCA) project identified by its Project ID.

action.description: The specific action to perform. Must be set to 'get_file_manifest'.

project_id.description: The unique UUID of the project (entryId) for which to retrieve files. This ID is typically obtained from the 'hca_search_projects' tool.

limit.description: The maximum number of files to list. The default is 10.

return_schema.description: A dictionary containing the file manifest, including the total file count and a list of file details.

total_files.description: The total number of files available for the project.

files.description: A list of file objects with download links and metadata.

url.description: The direct download URL for the file.

size.description: The size of the file in bytes.
